wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Gerald Patrick Sissons (28 June 1945 – 25 September 2016) was an English physician, specialising in nephrology and virology, focusing on cytomegalovirus. He was aFRCP, FRCPath, FMedSci and Regius Professor of Physic at the University of Cambridge.

response: * Patrick Sissons (b. 1945), Regius Professor of Physic, Cambridge University (Who's Who)
* Professor John Gerald Patrick Sissons. Regius Professor of Physic, University of Cambridge.  For services to Research and Education in Clinical Medicine.
*Sir Patrick Sissons, 71, British physician.Professor Sir Patrick Sissons (1945–2016)
